name: Making Up Constellations
description:
A starry night is a beautiful canvas to paint whatever comes to mind.

Immortalize a heartwarming experience or place your favourite animal among the stars. The sky is yours!

Take pictures of your fabulous sky and share them with your friends!

INSTRUCTIONS

Click on a star to start drawing. Right click to stop drawing.

Photos are saved in the "ConstellationPhotos" folder in your desktop.

FUTURE

The game will be updated to the 2.0 version with a story mode and new features before the end of the year.
